name: XWUI Breadcrumbs Component
description: Breadcrumb navigation component for displaying hierarchical paths. Supports custom separators, item collapsing, icons, and click handlers. Useful for navigation and showing user location in a hierarchy.

conf_comp.title: Component Configuration (conf_comp)
conf_comp.description: Component-specific settings set when initializing the component

separator.description: Separator character or HTML between breadcrumb items

maxItems.description: Maximum number of items to display before collapsing

collapseAt.description: Number of items at which to start collapsing

className.description: Additional CSS class name for the breadcrumbs

data.title: Component Data
data.description: Data to update the component, set when initializing the component

items.description: Array of breadcrumb items to display

label.description: Display label for the breadcrumb item

href.description: URL link for the breadcrumb item

icon.description: SVG icon HTML string for the breadcrumb item

onClick.description: Click handler function (not serializable in JSON)
